author: Scott McDonald
title: Multiple NBA Players, Legends and Coaches Film PSAs From Their Homes to Encourage Reducing Coronavirus Risks
description: The NBA was the first league to suspend its season because of coronavirus. Fourteen of the league's players have tested positive for the virus, and now players past and present are encouraging fans to take precautions to reduce getting it.
content: The National Basketball Association was the first major sports league in America to postpone its season when coronavirus became a growing concern, especially when one of its own players tested positive for the virus. SInce then, 13 more NBA players have teste… [+3232 chars]
